label: 無礼講
説明文: Alternately, Hareikō or Habutsukō.  A mixed group of low-ranking aristocrats, priests, and provincial warriors that held meetings, under the guise of a literary discussion group, at which they considered ways to eliminate the bakufu.  This group met under the auspices of Go-Daigo's intimates Hino Suketomo and Hino Toshimoto (p. 65). [破礼講、破仏講、後醍醐、日野資朝、日野俊基] [HW]
